title: Rising Poles Dripping Holes
description: I keep getting emails from regular readers of my website asking me to make the stories available in eBook format. They mentioned that although they like to come online and spend time on the site, they want to be able to take the stories with them, whether in their log cabin in the forest, or during that long trip on the plane. Many places or devices are not 100% connected to the internet, and quite a lot of people I know like to cut off all possible distraction and interruption when they indulge in a sexy story.So here comes the third of a long series of compilations of the best sexy stories of My Pouty Lips. Enjoy them everywhere and anywhere on your Kindle, iPad, or other tablet. Get a life, go offline!Rising Poles And Dripping Holes. One mind-blowing title for an anthology of three hot stories that will make you experience various levels of lust and envy.Each story is very different from the others, offering you a variety of situations that will nurture your imagination and wild fantasies.But enough with the talking. Let the action begin!
author: Aneglicka Wallows
